pullRequest.title: Use relative path with common-lib jar
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context. List any dependencies that are required for this change.
Fixes # (issue)
Type of change
Please delete options that are not relevant.

 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
 This change requires a documentation update

Checklist:

 My code follows the style guidelines of this project
 I have performed a self-review of my own code
 I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
 My changes generate no new warnings
 I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
 New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
 Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules

For more details about how should the code look like read the Contributing guideline

commit.message:
Correct location of common lib in start scripts

Signed-off-by: Jordan Cain <jordan@Jordans-MacBook-Pro.local>
Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>

Use relative path for common-lib path

Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>

Add comment as to why relative path for common_lib

Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,8 @@
 # - ZOWE_MANIFEST - The full path to Zowe's manifest.json file
 
 JAR_FILE="${LAUNCH_COMPONENT}/discovery-service-lite.jar"
-COMMON_LIB="${ROOT_DIR}/components/common-lib/bin/api-layer-lite-lib-all.jar"
+# script assumes it's in the gateway component directory and common_lib needs to be relative path

commit.message:
Add comment as to why relative path for common_lib

Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>

beforeCommit.message:
Rename common-lib to apiml-common-lib as per review comments

Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Add comment as to why relative path for common_lib

Signed-off-by: jordanCain <jordan.cain2@ibm.com>
